ending_theme: #1: "Pyoitto♪Halleluyah (ぴょいっと♪はれるや！)" by Special Week (Azumi Waki), Grass Wonder (Rena Maeda), El Condor Pasa (Minami Takahashi), Seiun Sky (CAkari Kitou), King Halo (Iori Saeki) (July)
#2: "Ring Ring Diary (Ring Ring ダイアリー)" by Toukai Teiou (Machico), Symboli Rudolf (Azusa Tadokoro), Air Groove (Ruriko Aoki), Fujikiseki (Eriko Matsui), Hishi Amazon (Yuiko Tatsumi) (August)

#3:  "Nigekiri! Fallin' Love (逃げ切りっ！ Fallin' Love)" by Silence Suzuka (Marika Kouno), Smart Falcon (Hitomi Ohwada), Mihono Bourbon (Ikumi Hasegawa), Maruzensky (Lynn), Ines Fuujin (Tomomi Mineuchi) (September)
